javax.security.enterprise.authentication.mechanism.http.HttpMessageContext

  • Packages that use HttpMessageContext 
    Package Description
    javax.security.enterprise.authentication.mechanism.http
    The HTTP authentication mechanism API package.

    • Uses of HttpMessageContext in javax.security.enterprise.authentication.mechanism.http

      Classes in javax.security.enterprise.authentication.mechanism.http that implement HttpMessageContext 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  HttpMessageContextWrapper
      This class is an implementation of the HttpMessageContext interface that can be subclassed by developers wishing to provide extra or different functionality.
